description: Take a pitstop during Consensus HK at Liquid Hours w/ Drift & DWF Options. Join Drift and DWF Options for an exclusive evening of drinks, conversations, and connections with the traders, founders, and builders shaping the onchain derivatives ecosystem. Unwind at Soho House as we bring together the traders and the broader DeFi community for a relaxed, high-signal happy hour where ideas flow as freely as the drinks. Gates open: 7:00 PM onwards Here s what to expect: Open bar with curated cocktails and bites Meet the Drift and DWF Options team Networking opportunities with traders, founders, and partners A relaxed, invite-only setting to set the tone for the week Entry by RSVP only. Let's get liquid. Partners Drift is the leading onchain perpetuals DEX on Solana, with 135B in trading volume, deep liquidity, and high-performance execution across 50 markets. With 1B TVL across its borrow-lend platform and Drift v3 now live, Drift is built for traders who want to outperform. DWF Options powered by Darley Technologies is a pioneering crypto options market-maker providing deep, reliable liquidity at competitive prices. DWF brings together expert scientists, traders, engineers and advanced trading infrastructure to deliver tailored solutions and OTC solutions across 1,000 cryptocurrencies, with 24/7 global market access for private, broker and institutional clients. See you at the event!
